english.segment1: Your eyes are watching me closely. Somehow you think that your not seen. You look through me in deep thought. But all that's on your mind in my unreal faults
english.segment2: . You don't know. You don't know me. You don't know. You don't know me
english.segment3: I know what's going through your mind. You think my surroundings have me blind. I know my motives are pure and true. You need to focus on what's best for you.
english.segment4: You don't know. You don't know me. You don't know. You don't know me
english.segment5: I tried to show you. But you think you know. And you know that assumptions. Won't get you far with me.
english.segment6: You don't know. You don't know me. You don't know. You don't know me
